channel.title: Unable to access FTB server
channel.description: I see that I'm on the whitelist, but I'm unable to log in. I believe it may have something to do with the fact that my account was migrated to a Mojang account (I was unable to even log in to vanilla without using the email address). Has anyone else experienced this problem?

item.title: Unable to access FTB server
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Phaze One:

What exactly is it telling you when you can’t login? Is it specifying you aren’t whitelisted or is it a connection error?

It’s specifically telling me I’m not white listed. Here, let me get some pictures up

Edit: Everything looks good now. Don’t know why it wasn’t letting me log in today.

Read full topic
